ResourceHeader.Description:
The spectromagnetograph at Kitt Peak was operational 1992-2002
and produced longitudinal magnetic field strength, pseudo continuum intensity, 
Doppler shift, equivalent width, and line depth in Fe I at 868.8 nm over the 
period November 19, 1992 to 2002 and in Fe I at 550.7 nm over the period 
April 21, 1992 to November 19, 1992. It also produced line strength and intensity 
in He I at 1083 nm over the period April 19, 1992 to 2002.  It was superseded by
a vector magnetograph in 2003.
